function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ieq monitoring system testing without considering infectious disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Connection loss due to low wifi signal","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in values based on the position of the smart ieq sensor nodes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air quality monitoring leading to potential spread of contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through smart ieq sensor nodes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data security risks related to sensor communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Highly infectious sars-cov-2 virus spreading between people in close contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 leading to significant confirmed cases and deaths","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density in cities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in complying with social distancing and capacity limitations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased gatherings in leisure areas and markets","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowds and hotspots in urban areas increasing the likelihood of contagion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerable groups in high-risk areas near schools and nursing homes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of risk areas in the city related to contagion propagation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability of the danger model to accurately capture the usual functioning of the city and the routines of its citizens.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of areas with the highest risk of contagion based on the occupancy model and knowledge base","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction of safe pedestrian routes in a covid-19 pandemic context","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of the proposed service for purposes other than covid-19 safety, such as avoiding sunny areas in summer or closed streets due to events","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for pandemic containment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Over-reliance on specific technological solutions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unintended consequences of technology integration","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective detection of abnormal patterns in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap between alert and mitigation applications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate crisis management and response to disease outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of sensors to detect symptoms may result in false positives or false negatives, leading to incorrect actions or delays in response.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring devices that track contact with infected people may raise privacy concerns and result in user resistance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowdsourced smartphone data and social network analysis may lead to biased or inaccurate conclusions about the mental state of citizens.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Standard message libraries for pandemic communication may lack cultural sensitivity and relevance to specific populations, leading to miscommunication or distrust.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinformation about pandemic management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of communication with vulnerable groups","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate context parameters related to citizens’ distribution in the city","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of temporal characteristics in context parameters","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Occupancy model for safe navigation during a pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inferencing occupation level of amenities through rule-based system approach","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease propagation in occupancy rules","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unintended privacy implications of tracking citizens’ routines and behaviour","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerability of different population groups to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission risk based on age and health status","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with safety measures, such as social distancing and mask usage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of invincibility among young people and young adults","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the seriousness of the covid-19 situation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of transmission risk and vulnerability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate modeling of population behavior and characteristics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to represent complex concepts in the knowledge base","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of control over the types of groups occupying different amenities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Undefined level of vulnerability for different groups of people","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of association between vulnerability levels and specific groups of people","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Modeling association between people and transmission risk","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate inference of occupation levels and transmission risk","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
